title: Mint Strawberry Vanilla Coffee Syrup
directions: In a small saucepan, combine water, sugar, sliced strawberries, and mint leaves.
Simmer gently for 5-8 minutes, stirring occasionally. Lightly mash the strawberries with a spoon or fork.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract and optional lemon juice.
Strain well through a fine-mesh sieve to remove mint and berry pulp. Press strawberries to extract all juice.
Let cool before bottling. Store in the fridge for 1-2 weeks.
notes: A lightly fruity and refreshing syrup. The vanilla smooths out the edges and gives a slightly creamy, rounded finish. Great in cold brew, iced lattes with milk or cream, sparkling water, lemonade, mojitos, and vodka spritzers. For a stronger berry flavor, use more strawberries.
